pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![check](https://github.com/retospect/phronesitron/actions/workflows/check.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/retospect/phronesitron/actions/workflows/check.yml)# PhronesitronPhronesitron is a set of tools to interact with textual AItools like OpenAI's models.Example use:```> ph explain quantum physics in 10 wordsMysterious particles with probabilistic behavior in complex systems.```Currently, openAI models are supported.# SetupSet the openAI API key (get it from here: https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys)```export OPENAIKEY=<put key here>```# VersioningUses semantic versioning. https://semver.org/
